content: दृढ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दृंह्-क्त नि° नलोपः] {@--1@} Fixed, firm, strong, unswerving, untiring; <ls>Bg. 15. 3</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 65</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 78.</ls> {@--2@} Solid, massive. {@--3@} Confirmed, established. {@--4@} Steady, persevering; <ls>Bg. 7. 28.</ls> {@--5@} Firmly fastened, shut fast. {@--6@} Compact. {@--7@} Tight, close, dense. {@--8@} Strong, intense, great, excessive, mighty, severe, powerful; तस्याः करिष्यामि दृढानुतापं <ls>Ku. 3. 8</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 46.</ls> {@--9@} Tough. {@--10@} Difficult to be drawn or bent (as a bow). {@--11@} Durable. {@--12@} Reliable. {@--13@} Certain, sure. {@--14@} Hard-hearted, cruel; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--15@} Secure. {@--16@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) Reduced to the smallest number by a common divisor. --ढं {@--1@} Iron. {@--2@} A stronghold, fortress. {@--3@} Excess, abundance, high degree. {@--4@} Anything fixed or firm or solid. --ढं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Firmly, fast. {@--2@} Very much, excessively, vehemently. {@--3@} Thoroughly.
